feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Line-of-business application using Azure App Service Environment v3
entry.summary: Learn how to deploy line-of-business applications with an internal App Service Environment v3, while considering networking boundaries, DevOps, management, and more.

entry.title: Azure API Management landing zone accelerator
entry.summary: An opinionated accelerator to deploy a secure enterprise-ready API management solution and CI/CD pipeline.

entry.title: Supply chain management - Track and trace with Quorum Blockchain Service
entry.summary: Use Quorum Blockchain Service to track and trace physical assets, along with their metadata.

entry.title: Create and deploy more applications in less time
entry.summary: Learn how to use the unified collection of services that the Microsoft Cloud provides to create and deploy more applications in less time.

entry.summary: Learn how to use the unified collection of services that the Microsoft Cloud provides to improve security.

entry.summary: Learn how to use the unified collection of services that the Microsoft Cloud provides to integrate new applications with existing solutions.

entry.summary: Learn how the unified collection of services that the Microsoft Cloud provides can deliver more value in less time with better security.

entry.title: DataOps architecture design
entry.summary: DataOps is a lifecycle approach to data analytics that uses agile practices to deliver high-quality data.

entry.title: Rehost a general mainframe on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to create a general mainframe rehosting architecture on Azure. Rehosting is a cost-effective method to maintain old mainframe hardware.

entry.title: Deploy microservices with Azure Container Apps and Dapr
entry.summary: Build a serverless microservices solution on Azure Container Apps using Distributed Application Runtime (Dapr) and Kubernetes Event-Driven Autoscaling (KEDA).

entry.title: Connected factory hierarchy service
entry.summary: Implement a hierarchy service so business stakeholders can centrally define the organization of production assets like machines within factories.

entry.title: AKS container CI/CD with Jenkins and Kubernetes
entry.summary: By orchestrating the deployment of containers using Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), you can achieve replicable, manageable clusters of containers.

entry.title: Content Delivery Network analytics
entry.summary: This architecture pattern demonstrates low-latency high throughput ingestion for large volumes of Content Delivery Network (CDN) logs for building near real-time analytics dashboards.

entry.title: Knowledge mining for content research
entry.summary: Knowledge mining with a search index makes it easy for customers and employees to locate what they're looking for faster.

entry.title: Knowledge mining in contract management
entry.summary: Learn how to use knowledge mining in contract management to help your organization scour thousands of pages to create an accurate bid.

entry.title: Cross-cloud scaling with Azure Functions
entry.summary: Understand how to improve cross-cloud scalability with solution architecture that includes Azure Stack.

entry.title: Cross-platform chat
entry.summary: Use this architecture to accelerate development of reliable, high-performing chat applications.

entry.title: Enterprise deployment using Azure ASE
entry.summary: Learn about the recommended architecture for deploying an enterprise application using App Services Environment in Azure.

entry.title: Cloud scale analytics with TimeXtender
entry.summary: Use TimeXtender to build a modern data estate that is ready for cloud scale analytics using a drag-and-drop user interface, with definitions stored in a metadata repository.

entry.title: AI enrichment with image and text processing
entry.summary: Transform latent information in your image and text data into full text searchable content with Azure Cognitive Search pre-built and custom skills.

entry.summary: Learn about a custom collaboration solution that uses libraries and Azure services.

entry.title: Design review powered by mixed reality
entry.summary: With this mixed reality scenario, clients, designers, and onsite engineers can easily share and review designs as 3D holograms in the context of their environment.

entry.summary: Learn how to build high availability of services into your business continuity and disaster recovery strategy.

entry.summary: This example shows how to establish the production environment for Business Central in partner private Azure environment.

entry.title: Campaign optimization with SQL Server
entry.summary: Optimize when and how to contact potential customers to improve marketing campaign success rates with machine learning and SQL Server 2016 with R Services.

entry.summary: Whether you use ASP.NET, Java, Node.js, or PHP to develop applications, you'll need a CI/CD pipeline to automatically push changes to these virtual machines.

entry.summary: Learn how to orchestrate CI/CD of the quantum computing components of your classical applications to create replicable, manageable hybrid solutions.

entry.summary: This article describes how to use MSIX to enable CI/CD for building, deploying, and updating Windows desktop applications.

entry.summary: This reference architecture shows how to conduct distributed training of deep learning models across clusters of GPU-enabled VMs using Azure Machine Learning.

entry.summary: Improve your organization's governance process by using Azure Purview in your Azure SQL estate.
